trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBFST101_00444_SEQ_00<tab>Merthelin, the levemete at Camp Tranquil, seeks capable adventurers to undertake his many tasks.
TEXT_SUBFST101_00444_SEQ_01<tab>Merthelin is eager to have you begin accepting levequests, but first you must complete a trial leve to prove that your skills as an adventurer are up to the task.
TEXT_SUBFST101_00444_SEQ_02<tab>You have successfully completed the trial leve. Return to Camp Tranquil and report to the levemete, Merthelin.
TEXT_SUBFST101_00444_SEQ_03<tab>Merthelin is clearly overjoyed at your success. Prove his trust in you is well placed by undertaking future levequests in service to the people of Camp Tranquil.
TEXT_SUBFST101_00444_TODO_01<tab>Report to Merthelin at Camp Tranquil.
TEXT_SUBFST101_00444_MERTHELIN_000_1<tab>Looking for a spot of work? Then you've come to the right place. I'm Merthelin, a representative of the Adventurers' Guild.
TEXT_SUBFST101_00444_MERTHELIN_000_2<tab>As the levemete stationed here in Camp Tranquil, I'm responsible for assigning the various tasks that come in from the beleaguered locals.

TEXT_SUBFST101_00444_MERTHELIN_000_3<tab>Quite a number of these tasks can entail a significant degree of danger, however. If I'm to set you loose on my leves with a clear conscience, I must first be convinced of your capacity to surmount the challenges you're likely to encounter.
TEXT_SUBFST101_00444_MERTHELIN_000_4<tab>Hmmm. How about we start you off with a leve of my choosing, and see how you get on? Let's try this one, shall we?

TEXT_SUBFST101_00444_MERTHELIN_000_5<tab>Excellent. Pray be aware that while you are retrieving the furs, you may encounter the poachers themselves. I suggest you arm yourself for battle. Good fortune to you, adventurer, and I hope to receive word of your success in the very near future!
TEXT_SUBFST101_00444_MERTHELIN_000_10<tab>The leve can be initiated once your preparations are complete. You need not rush into these things until you are sure you are quite ready.

TEXT_SUBFST101_00444_MERTHELIN_000_15<tab>Bravo, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! I had a feeling you would do well from the moment we met. And though this was but a trial, you earned your reward nonetheless.
TEXT_SUBFST101_00444_MERTHELIN_000_20<tab>Now that your trial leve has begun, I'm afraid you're on your own. Speak with me again once your task is complete.
TEXT_SUBFST101_00444_MERTHELIN_000_25<tab>I must say, I was rather impressed with your results! I see no reason not to grant you access to a greater range of levequests.
TEXT_SUBFST101_00444_MERTHELIN_000_26<tab>Your most difficult task now is choosing what to attempt next!
